text: Martin Edward Elkort (April 18, 1929 â€“ November 19, 2016) is an American photographer, illustrator and writer. He is best known for his street photography. Many of his works are held and displayed by several well known art museums in the United States. Elkort was born in the New York City, New York borough of The Bronx. He grew up during the Great Depression. He married Edythe in 1953. He lived in Los Angeles, California with his wife. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:American illustrators Category:American photographers Category:Writers from New York City Category:2016 deaths
title: Martin Elkort
